subject: Hockey, Ice
Concussions
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Boston Bruins center Marc Savard will miss the rest of the season after he was placed on long-term injured reserve Monday with his second concussion in less than a year.
snippet: Boston Bruins center Marc Savard will miss the rest of the season after he was placed on long-term injured reserve Monday with his second concussion in less than a year.
